text: Rodrigo Federico Espíndola (29 July 1989 - 13 May 2016) was an Argentine professional footballer. He played for Chacarita Juniors, Racing Club and most notably Nueva Chicago. He played as a defender. He was born in Monte Grande, Argentina. He began his career in 2009. Espíndola died on 13 May 2016 after being shot during a robbery in Monte Grande, Argentina, aged 26. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths by firearm Category:Murder victims Category:Argentine footballers
title: Rodrigo Espíndola
